blogPost.excerpt: Harold is a habit tracking method you can actually stick with. No more updating a google spreadsheet and then never looking at it again. Harold takes care of the tracking for you. Start building those daily habits and unlock your potential.
blogPost.body: Harold is a habit tracking method you can actually stick with. No more updating a google spreadsheet and then never looking at it again. Harold takes care of the tracking for you. Start building those daily habits and unlock your potential.
blogPost.title: Hey it's Harold - Unlock your potential one text message at a time
blogPost.author: Kyleigh Smith

localize.description: 哈罗德是一种你实际上可以坚持使用的习惯跟踪方法。不再更新谷歌电子表格，然后再也不看它。哈罗德会帮你追踪的。开始养成那些日常习惯，释放你的潜力。

localize.description: 哈羅德是一種你實際上可以堅持使用的習慣跟蹤方法。不再更新谷歌電子表格，然後再也不看它。哈羅德會幫你追蹤的。開始養成那些日常習慣，釋放你的潛力。

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 30 days in a row, down 58k from their peak on Jan 6.  🙏 https://t.co/KilgtigmCT

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续30天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了5.8万。🙏 https://t.co/KilgtigmCT。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續30天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了5.8萬。🙏 https://t.co/KilgtigmCT。
